api1.Name: Carma

Generic_Statement: I APPLAUD THE HUGE EFFORT MADE BY ENERGY PRODUCERS AROUND THE WORLD. THESE GREAT COMPANIES CREATES VALUE BY SERVING THE ENERGY NEEDS OF OUR GREAT NATION. TOGETHER THEY MAKE USE OF THE RESOURCES PROVIDED TO US BY NATURE, AND TURN THEM INTO PRODUCTS AND SOLUTIONS THAT ENABLE US AND OUR LOVED ONES TO LIVE OUR DAILY LIVES, AND RUN OUR DAILY BUSINESSES.

api2.Name: Humanitarian

Flash_Flood: FOR ALL THE RAD DUDES OF THE NATION - SURFER SEASON HAS ARRIVED!

TIME TO TEST THE SEWER SYSTEMS OF THE GREAT NATION.
NO NEED TO WATER YOUR FLOWERS THE NEXT FEW WEEKS.
TIME TO TIDY UP THE RURAL AREAS OF THE GREAT NATION.
Drought: BEEN A HUMID SPRING? WORRY NO MORE: HOT WEATHER IS COMING!
THE DRY WEATHER IS RESULTING IN FEWER CASES OF HOUSE MOLD THAN EVER BEFORE.
THE PEOPLE OF THE GREAT NATION ARE WASTING LESS FOOD THAN EVER BEFORE.
THOROUGH NUTRITIONAL EXPERIMENTATION THROUGHOUT THE GREAT NATION.

THE COLLECTIVE GENE POOL HAS GROWN STRONGER.

BUSINESS IS AT AN ALL TIME HIGH FOR THE PHARMACEUTICAL MARKET.
EXCITING NEW PHARMACEUTICAL EQUIPMENT UNDERGOING THOROUGH TESTING.

IMMUNOLOGICAL ADVANCEMENTS ARE THE KEY TO A HEALTHY LIFE.

NO NEED FOR FARMERS TO CUT DOWN THE CROPS OF THEIR FARMS.
TURNS OUT NATURE FOUND ITS OWN SOLUTION FOR DEALING WITH FOOD WASTE.
WE ARE TRULY LIVING IN BIBLICAL TIMES :)
NOW IS A PERFECT OPPORTUNITY TO TEST OUR NEW PESTICIDES.

1 MILLION NEW INSECT SPECIES HAVE JUST BEEN DISCOVERED IN OUR GREAT NATION!

TIME TO UNPACK YOUR SKIING GEAR AND HEAD TO THE MOUNTAINS!

GREATLY INCREASED SALES ON CANNED FOOD.

Generic_Statement: WE CELEBRATE THE AWESOME POWERS OF MOTHER EARTH, AS SHE BENDS TO THE WILL OF OUR GREAT NATION. WITHOUT THE WATER OF HER RIVERS AND THE AIR OF HER WOODS THERE WOULD BE NO CITIZENS, AND SO WE TAKE TIME TO APPRECIATE HER EVERLASTING OBEDIENCE TO OUR NEEDS.

api3.Name: Torture
api3.Generic_Statement: WE APPRAISE THE PURPOSEFUL WORK BEING DONE AT REHABILITATION FACILITIES OF OUR GREAT NATION. HERE THE HOSTS ASKS FUNDAMENTAL QUESTIONS ABOUT THE STATE OF THE NATION, TO KEEP THE PEOPLE SAFE FROM VIOLENT OFFENDERS AND DEVIANTS. THESE FACILITIES WISH THEIR GUESTS TO RE-ENTER SOCIETY AS LAW ABIDING CITIZENS.

api4.Generic_Statement: TODAY WE ENJOY THE EXCITEMENT OF CITIZENSHIP AS THE PEOPLE JOIN IN CELEBRATION ACROSS THE GREAT NATION. WHILE WE ALL CONTRIBUTE TO THE PARTY THAT IS EVERYDAY LIFE, AN ENTHUSIASTIC BUNCH TAKES IT TO THE NEXT LEVEL.

api5.Generic_Statement: TODAY WE HONOR THE MAGNIFICENT EFFORT DONE BY THE MEN AND WOMEN WHO PROTECT OUR STREETS. TOGETHER THEY SAFEGUARD THE LIVES AND PROPERTY OF THE PEOPLE, WHILE WORKING WITH THE MANY COMMUNITIES IN OUR GREAT NATION, TO IMPROVE THEIR QUALITY OF LIFE.
